episode_event_general_battleliteracy/670:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] team beat the
Champion Stadium and got into the Hall of Fame.
We did it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

When we give it our all, we can battle on
par with members of the Elite Four—and
even Champions!
It’s still too early to celebrate!
The real challenge starts with Hard mode!
Blue! And the Indigo Elite Four!
But what do you mean by Hard mode?
Exactly what you think!

In the Champion Stadium, Normal mode is just a
gateway to even tougher challenges!

More and more sync pairs have been coming to
challenge us here at the Champion Stadium.

The stronger our challengers, the more
experience we gain from battling them!

We learn from this experience, and we use it to
fine-tune our skills even further!

That’s how we’re able to make things even more
challenging for you in Hard mode! We’re not fond
of losing, either, you know!
I... I see.

We only barely beat them on Normal mode...
Will we even stand a chance?

Yeah, it’ll be tough unless you really understand
the ins and outs of Pasio’s three-on-three battles!

But y’know what? Pasio’s also got the perfect
training ground for super champions...
Victory Road!
What?!

There, you can really get a good understanding
of how battles work... So maybe you should
give it a shot!

I’m looking forward to another match with you all
once you’ve upped your game even more!

All right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Since we’ve
made it this far, why don’t we make beating
Champion Stadium’s Hard mode our next goal?

Yeah! Let’s head over to Victory Road and start
training more!
